text:
Hi guys,

I need your help. Am working on projects to convert old style HubSpot templates to boilerplate drag and drop feature theme website. So is there any references to convert that old temple into boilerplate template or I have to make that template again with boilerplate terms.
Hello everybody. Boys is it possible to do something like this?
Nope, not at the moment, but I can pitch the idea to the team internally.
It would be great, thank you very much
